name: Dungeon Warrior 2
description:
DUNGEON WARRIOR 2
DUNGEON WARRIOR 2
DUNGEON WARRIOR 2
DUNGEON WARRIOR 2

Create a party of four members to enter a new world where four
princesses needs your help finding their crowns to become queens
and fight the evil Voard. Explore a new world where you battle
new enemies and learn new spells with your mages and ministers.
Promote your classes as you progress in the game and eat food to
increase your character stats. Solve Puzzles and avoid dangerous
traps as you explore this new world. Can you help the princesses
become queens and save the world from the Voard?
